Package ohos.security.permission

Annotation Type NeedsPermission


  • @Documented
@Retention(CLASS)
@Target({PARAMETER,CONSTRUCTOR,ANNOTATION_TYPE,METHOD,FIELD})
public @interface NeedsPermission
    Indicates that one or more permissions are required for invoking an interface.
    Since:
    5
    SystemCapability
    SystemCapability.Security.Permission

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element Description
      String[] all
      Specifies a list of all required permission names.
      String[] any
      Specifies a list of permission names, where at least one permission name is required.
      boolean partial
      If this value is true, permission is not necessarily required in all cases.
      String value
      The name of the required permission when a permission is required.

    • Element Detail

      • value

        String value
        The name of the required permission when a permission is required. If more than one permission is required, specify all() or any().

        If this parameter is specified, both any() and all() must be empty.

        Default:
        ""

      • any

        String[] any
        Specifies a list of permission names, where at least one permission name is required.

        If this parameter is specified, both all() and value() must be empty.

        Default:
        {}

      • all

        String[] all
        Specifies a list of all required permission names.

        If this parameter is specified, both any() and value() must be empty.

        Default:
        {}

      • partial

        boolean partial
        If this value is true, permission is not necessarily required in all cases.
        Default:
        false
